original_text: The Almighty Lord will cause his righteousness to grow everywhere. It will grow like crops in the fields, and like plants that grow in a garden. Then his people will praise him, and all the nations will see it! The Almighty Lord will cause his righteousness to grow everywhere. It will grow like crops in the fields, and like plants that grow in a garden. Then his people will praise him, and all the nations will see it! The Almighty Lord will cause his righteousness
korean_text: 땅이 싹을 내며 동산이 거기 뿌린 것을 움돋게 함 같이 주 여호와께서 공의와 찬송을 모든 나라 앞에 솟아나게 하시리라

sentences.original_text: The Almighty Lord will cause his righteousness
It will grow like crops in the fields
and like plants that grow in a garden
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 정원에서 자라는 식물처럼 자랄 것이다

sentences.original_text: Then his people will praise him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그의 백성이 그를 찬양할 것이다

sentences.original_text: and all the nations will see it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 민족이 그것을 볼 것이다

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 정원에서 자라는 식물처럼 자랄 것이다

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 민족이 그것을 볼 것이다
